entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Kuujjuarapik
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:30 AM EST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -33.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kuujjuarapik Airport 06:00 AM EST Monday 06 February 2023
Condition: Clear
Temperature: -33.4°C
Pressure: 102.3 kPa
Visibility: 14.5 km
Humidity: 70 %
Wind Chill: -45
Dewpoint: -37.0°C
Wind: SE 13 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 21.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness this afternoon. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 21. Wind chill minus 46 this morning and minus 31 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Blizzard. Temperature rising to minus 8 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow. Blizzard developing near midnight. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 increasing to 50 gusting to 70 near midnight. Temperature rising to minus 8 by morning. Wind chill minus 33 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Blizzard. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Blizzard ending near noon then snow and blowing snow. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning and minus 21 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 22.
